About

Freelancer is a free bootstrap theme created by Start Bootstrap. The download includes the complete source files including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as well as optional LESS stylesheets for easy customization.

Whether you're a student looking to showcase your work, a professional looking to attract clients, or a graphic artist looking to share your projects, this template is the perfect starting point!

Download Theme

Around the Web

About DataSwarm

Freelance is a free to use, open source Bootstrap theme created by Start Bootstrap.

Copyright © DataSwarm 2015

DataSwarm Notebook

This is an multipurpose area: allows data scientists to perform analysis and proof of concepts quickly. They can also share results and save them for reuse. It is based on Zeppelin Notebook.

Project Title

DataSwarm allows create, resize and remove clusters.

Project Title

  • Date: April 2014

Versions Control

Track your notebooks versions. Socialice (or not) your code, but has full control of it.
